name: Secure Connect
discription: Secure Connect is a script that helps make connecting or starting a connection service easy

options.name: Digital Ocean Resume Droplet
options.discription: SSH connect to Resume droplet on digital ocean

options.name: ExpressVPN Smart Connect
options.discription: ExpressVPN pass through command, connect option is smart location

options.name: Synergy
options.discription: Start and stop the service for Synergy, a program to use mouse and keyboard over wifi

options.name: Add new command
options.discription: Add a new command to the Secure Connect script

options.name: Help Text
options.discription:
Secure Connect Usage: sc {-Option/Command-}

Options:
dor               Digital Ocean: Resume droplet
ex                ExpressVPN: Smart connect
synergy,-syn      [start, stop] systemctl service for synergy.service

Commands:
--help,-h         Display this help message
--add,-a          add new connection wizard
